name: VNFaceObservation
desc: Face or facial-feature information that an image analysis request detects.

items.name: init(requestRevision: Int, boundingBox: CGRect, roll: NSNumber?, yaw: NSNumber?, pitch: NSNumber?)
items.desc: Creates an observation that contains the roll, yaw, and pitch of the face.

items.name: var landmarks: VNFaceLandmarks2D?
items.desc: The facial features of the detected face.

items.name: class VNFaceLandmarks2D
items.desc: A collection of facial features that a request detects.

items.name: class VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D
items.desc: 2D geometry information for a specific facial feature.

items.name: class VNFaceLandmarks
items.desc: The abstract superclass for containers of face landmark information.

items.name: class VNFaceLandmarkRegion
items.desc: The abstract superclass for information about a specific face landmark.

items.name: var roll: NSNumber?
items.desc: The roll angle of a face in radians.

items.name: var yaw: NSNumber?
items.desc: The yaw angle of a face in radians.

items.name: var pitch: NSNumber?
items.desc: The pitch angle of a face in radians.

items.name: var faceCaptureQuality: Float?
items.desc: The capture quality of the face, normalized between 0.0 and 1.0.
